analyzed: thera vāda vinaya
mahāvibhaṅga
pāṭidesanīya kaṇḍa
dutiya pāṭidesanīya sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kulesu nimantitāḥ bhuñjanti

original: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vosāsantiyo ṭhitā honti—
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam vosāsantiyaḥ ṭhitāḥ honti
idha sūpam detha idha odanam detha ati
chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū yāvadattham bhuñjanti
aññe bhikkhū na cittarūpam bhuñjanti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhuniyaḥ vosāsantiyaḥ na nivāressanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivārethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ vosāsantiyaḥ na nivāretha ati
sat ca bhagavān ati
vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe moghapurisāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ vosāsantiyaḥ na nivāressatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Bhikkhū paneva kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti, tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā
analyzed: bhikkhū pana iva kulesu nimantitāḥ bhuñjanti tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamāna rūpā

original: ṭhitā hoti—‘idha sūpaṁ detha, idha odanaṁ dethā’ti, tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā—
analyzed: ṭhitā hoti idha sūpam detha idha odanam detha ati tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā

original: ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti. Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya
analyzed: apasakka tāva bhagini yāva bhikkhū bhuñjanti iti ekassa ce pi bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya

original: taṁ bhikkhuniṁ apasādetuṁ— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti paṭidesetabbaṁ tehi bhikkhūhi—
analyzed: tam bhikkhunim apasādetu apasakka tāva bhagini yāva bhikkhū bhuñjanti iti paṭidesetabbam tehi bhikkhūhi

original: ‘gārayhaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ āpajjimhā asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ, taṁ paṭidesemā’”ti.
analyzed: gārayhaḥ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajjimhā asappāyam tam paṭidesema ati
bhikkhū pana iva kulesu nimantitāḥ bhuñjanti iti

original: kulaṁ nāma cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
analyzed: kulam nāma cattāri kulāni khattiya kula brāhmaṇa kula vessa kula sudda kula
nimantitāḥ bhuñjanti iti

original: pañcannaṁ bhojanānaṁ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti.
analyzed: pañcannam bhojanānam aññatarena bhojanena nimantitāḥ bhuñjanti
bhikkhunī nāma
ubhatas saṅghe upasampannā
vosāsantī nāma

original: yathāmittatā yathāsandiṭṭhatā yathāsambhattatā yathāsamānupajjhāyakatā yathāsamānācariyakatā— “idha sūpaṁ detha, idha odanaṁ dethā”ti. Esā vosāsantī nāma.
analyzed: yathā mitta tā yathā sandiṭṭha tā yathā sambhatta tā yathā samāna upajjhāyaka tā yathā samāna ācariyaka tā idha sūpam detha idha odanam detha ati esā vosāsantī nāma
tehi bhikkhūhi iti
bhuñjamānehi bhikkhūhi
sā bhikkhunī iti
yā sā vosāsantī bhikkhunī

original: Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— “apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti.
analyzed: tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā apasakka tāva bhagini yāva bhikkhū bhuñjanti iti

original: Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno anapasādito— “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ekassa ce pi bhikkhuno an apasāditaḥ khādissāmi bhuñjissāmi iti paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa
ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa

original: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya upasampanna saññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa

original: Upasampannāya vematiko vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya vematikaḥ vosāsantiyā na nivāreti āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa

original: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya anupasampanna saññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa

original: Ekatoupasampannāya vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ekatas upasampannāya vosāsantiyā na nivāreti āpatti dukkaṭassa

anāpatti
attanaḥ bhattam dāpeti na deti
aññesam bhattam deti na dāpeti
yam na dinnam tam dāpa iti
yattha na dinnam tattha dāpa iti

sikkhamānā vosāsati
